Bayān al-najāsāt
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Ibn al-ʻImād al-Aqfahsī, Aḥmad , approximately 1349-1405

oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Title from f. 1r in later hand.
According to the colophon (f. 10v), copy completed in Jumād[á] [sic] al-awwal 1302 AH [February 1885 AD].
Written in two columns, 15 lines per page, in black with punctuation in red.
Cream laid paper watermarks. 22.2 x 16.1 cm. (17.5 x 10 cm.).
MS Arab 176. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
